ROM.Changelog: * **ROM Changes** *Version bump to v1.2 *Merged December Security patch *More visual bug fixes *QS tiles track color accent in Dot O theme. *Dot pixel theme has been made to have the same O white feel except with no QS tiles tint. *Added Network Indicator (Settings->Data Usage). *Added Changelog section inside About. *New settings icons. *Re-work on overall app icons. *Some new dope walls. *And many more bug fixes and performace enhancements.
